Text: Seed please! I need this music to a movie im making about the game.

Note that these are only 5 of the 20 tracks from the soundtrack composed by Michael Giacchino. These where accidentally released by EA on their French website.

You can purchase the soundtrack here:

http://www.werkshop.com/store/item.action?artist_id=1206&cat_id=1&item_id=4777

Note that Nettwerk has a good track record, MP3d do not include DRM. They have even paid legal fees for RIAA victims. Read more here:

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nettwerk
Thanks for making these available looksee!
